field.name: ma_nv
field.check: ma_nv not in (select ma_nv from hrnv)

field.name: dia_chi_th_tru
field.updateValue: case when b.dia_chi_th_tru <> '' then b.dia_chi_th_tru else a.dia_chi_th_tru end

field.name: cmnd_so
field.updateValue: case when b.cmnd_so <> '' then b.cmnd_so else a.cmnd_so end

field.name: cmnd_ngay_hl
field.updateValue: case when b.cmnd_ngay_hl is not null then b.cmnd_ngay_hl else a.cmnd_ngay_hl end

field.name: cmnd_noi_cap
field.updateValue: case when b.cmnd_noi_cap <> '' then b.cmnd_noi_cap else a.cmnd_noi_cap end

field.name: so_hdld
field.check: exists (select 1 from vhrcthd b where @@table.so_hdld = b.so_hdld and (not (@@table.ma_nv = b.ma_nv and @@table.ngay_ky_hd = b.ngay_ky_hd)))⩓so_hdld in (select so_hdld from @@table group by so_hdld having count(*) > 1)

field.name: loai_hd
field.check: loai_hd not in (select ma_loai from hrdmloaihd)

field.name: ngay_hl_den
field.check: ngay_hl_den is null and exists(select 1 from hrdmloaihd z where z.ma_loai = #table.loai_hd and z.tinh_chat = '2')

declare @q nvarchar(4000), @key nvarchar(4000), @message nvarchar(4000), @join nvarchar(1023), @field varchar(32) declare @user int, @admin bit, @sys varchar(32), @joinUnit bit, @joinDept bit, @r int select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @sys = '@@sysDatabaseName', @key = '', @joinUnit = 0, @joinDept = 0
-- Checking &Checking;
&EndErrorMode;
-- Key if @admin = 0 begin exec AI_ERP$HRM$DeptRightFilter @user, @admin, 'e', 'e', @sys, @key output, @joinUnit output, @joinDept output select @key = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$GetCheckKey(@key) select @key = case when @key = '' then '' else ' and (' + @key + ')' end
if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'hrLaborContract', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end end
select top 0 stt_rec, dia_chi_th_tru, cmnd_so, cmnd_ngay_hl, cmnd_noi_cap, so_ld, so_ngay_cap, so_noi_cap, thanh_nien_yn, tan_tat_yn, so_hdld, loai_hd, ngay_lv_tu, ngay_lv_den, ngay_tv_tu, ngay_tv_den, ngay_hl_tu, ngay_hl_den, ngay_ky_hd, dia_diem, chuc_danh, chuc_vu, nghe_nghiep, cong_viec, thoi_gian, dung_cu, phuong_tien, muc_luong, tien_thuong, phu_cap, bao_ho_ld, thoa_thuan into #r from hrcthd
select @q = 'insert into #r select e.stt_rec, a.dia_chi_th_tru, a.cmnd_so, a.cmnd_ngay_hl, a.cmnd_noi_cap, a.so_ld, a.so_ngay_cap, a.so_noi_cap,' select @q = @q + ' a.thanh_nien_yn, a.tan_tat_yn, a.so_hdld, a.loai_hd, a.ngay_lv_tu, a.ngay_lv_den, a.ngay_tv_tu, a.ngay_tv_den, a.ngay_hl_tu, a.ngay_hl_den, a.ngay_ky_hd,' select @q = @q + ' a.dia_diem, a.chuc_danh, a.chuc_vu, a.nghe_nghiep, a.cong_viec, a.thoi_gian, a.dung_cu, a.phuong_tien, a.muc_luong, a.tien_thuong, a.phu_cap, a.bao_ho_ld, a.thoa_thuan' select @q = @q + ' from @@table a join hrnv e on a.ma_nv = e.ma_nv where e.status = ''1''' + @key exec sp_executesql @q
if @type = '0' delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from hrcthd b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_ky_hd = b.ngay_ky_hd) select a.* into #k from #r a join hrcthd b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_ky_hd = b.ngay_ky_hd delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_ky_hd = b.ngay_ky_hd)
update #r set dia_chi_th_tru = case when a.dia_chi_th_tru <> '' then a.dia_chi_th_tru else case when b.dia_chi_th_tru <> '' then rtrim(b.dia_chi_th_tru) + case when m.ten_quan <> '' then ' - ' + rtrim(m.ten_quan) + case when n.ten_tinh <> '' then ' - ' + rtrim(n.ten_tinh) else '' end else '' end else '' end end, cmnd_so = case when a.cmnd_so <> '' then a.cmnd_so else case when b.cmnd_so <> '' then b.cmnd_so else isnull(b.ho_chieu_so, '') end end, cmnd_ngay_hl = case when a.cmnd_ngay_hl <> '' then a.cmnd_ngay_hl else cast( case when b.cmnd_so <> '' then b.cmnd_ngay_hl else case when b.ho_chieu_so <> '' then b.ho_chieu_ngay_hl else null end end as smalldatetime) end, cmnd_noi_cap = case when a.cmnd_noi_cap <> '' then a.cmnd_noi_cap else case when b.cmnd_so <> '' then isnull(p.ten_tinh, '') else case when b.ho_chieu_so <> '' then isnull(q.ten_qt, '') else '' end end end from #r a left join hrnv b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec left join hrdmtinh p on b.cmnd_noi_cap = p.ma_tinh left join hrdmtinh n on b.dia_chi_th_tru_tinh = n.ma_tinh left join hrdmquan m on b.dia_chi_th_tru_quan = m.ma_quan and b.dia_chi_th_tru_tinh = m.ma_tinh left join dmqt q on b.ho_chieu_noi_cap = q.ma_qt
-- Insert &Inserting; -- Update if @type = '1' begin update hrcthd set @@list from hrcthd a join #k b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ngay_ky_hd = b.ngay_ky_hd end
